Settings

Settings

IMPORTANT

If you only see this and console output then that means your API Key has not been set or it is invalid, in order for this to work
you must set your API key.

To get your API Key you must create an application on the Offical PUBG Developer website.
Once you have done that, set it by pasting it in the text box below and click the button below that, by doing this you agree for us to use your cookies to store you API Key, this is done so we can not see it in any way because all of the processing is done by your browser.

Current API Key

if you don't know what you're doing, dont change the proxy address

Current API Key http://api.dxcdn.net/tournament
